description:
Conan, Ran, Sonoko, and Sera are invited to their classmate Sekizawa Yumi`s birthday party. Because her older sister Sekizawa Remi the model`s birthday is one day earlier, their joint birthday party is attended by numerous celebrities, Remi`s manager Kushiyama Mitomu, Remi`s classmate and pastry chef Hatsune Tsuguo, and hair and makeup artist Hanasaki Mizutoshi. Conan, who has trouble speaking due to the cold sore he developed several days earlier, takes out a pill case so he can take some medicine before the party starts when he`s spotted by Sera. Inside the case is the APTX-4869 antidote Haibara gave him during his school trip...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Birthday Party of Divine Punishment (Part 1)
عقوبة إلهية في حفل عيد الميلاد (الجزء الأول)
天罰くだる誕生パーティー (前編)
